stimulusHtml:
Liu is a Chinese exchange student studying in the United States. She is feeling lonely and may have depression. She goes to a psychologist to report her symptoms. The major symptom Liu reports to the psychologist is that she has been feeling much back pain lately, a common symptom of depression in China. Because the psychologist does not see this as a symptom of depression, he refers her to a physical therapist.

Which of the following may influence the decision of the psychiatrist?
